RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 1 1M Dirt CR: 59. Maiden Special Weight Purse 30000. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. (Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less $20,000).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: THE CALLING STONE reserved near the back in the early going, moved up on the outside around the final turn, entered the stretch six wide and got up late for the win. SURREY raced within contention, forwardly placed throughout, was outfinished for the win and was just up for place. LAST OF THE NILE vied for the early lead, saved ground, was outfinished by the top two and proved best of others. CALIFORNIA BELLE went to the front, drove clear, came around the final turn three wide, weakened and lacked a finish. SIKARA SIKARA bobbled at the start, racing in the back of the pack and was never a factor. MARMO MOON raced evenly near the back and was never close. BABY LOCKOUT pressed the early pace and dropped back.

ENTRY.NAME: Marmo Moon
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly near back, never close

ENTRY.NAME: Last of the Nile
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for early lead, saved ground, outfinished, best of others

ENTRY.NAME: Surrey
ENTRY.COMMENT: within contention, forward throughout, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: California Belle
ENTRY.COMMENT: went to front, drove clear, 3wide final turn, no finish

ENTRY.NAME: Baby Lockout
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, dropped back

ENTRY.NAME: Sikara Sikara
ENTRY.COMMENT: bobbled start, in back of pack, never a factor

ENTRY.NAME: The Calling Stone
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved near back, outside 2nd tn, 5wide into stretch, best late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 2 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 81. Claiming Purse 10000. FOR FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE OCTOBER 8, 2022 OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE APRIL 8, 2022. Weight, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since March 8, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: I'LL RAISE YOU raced within striking distance, moved up between rivals around the turn and drove clear down the lane. PRAY IDE SING dueled for the early lead, forwardly placed throughout, proved no match for the winner late, but was a clear second. GALAXY BUILDER had an awkward start, racing in the back and made a late inside gain. B B MOODY vied on the front end, saved ground around the turn, weakened and lacked a late kick. GRACIDA raced evenly in the middle of the field and put forth an even effort. CUSTOMIZE MY QUEST raced near the back, finished wide and was no factor. SR. CLARKY void of early speed, saved ground around the turn and was never close. HONORARIAN pressed the pace, faded and was no threat late. LUNAR LIGHT lacked early speed, had a wide trip and showed little.

ENTRY.NAME: B B Moody
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied on front end, saved ground, weakened, no late kick

ENTRY.NAME: Galaxy Builder
ENTRY.COMMENT: had an awkward start, in back, late inside gain

ENTRY.NAME: Sr. Clarky
ENTRY.COMMENT: void of early speed, inside turn, never close

ENTRY.NAME: Pray Ide Sing
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled for lead, forward throughout, no match late, clear 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Honorarian
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, finished early

ENTRY.NAME: Customize My Quest
ENTRY.COMMENT: near back, finished wide, no factor

ENTRY.NAME: I'll Raise You
ENTRY.COMMENT: within striking distance, between turn, pulled away late

ENTRY.NAME: Lunar Light
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked early speed, wide trip, showed little

ENTRY.NAME: Gracida
ENTRY.COMMENT: in middle of field, even effort

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 3 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 71. Maiden Special Weight Purse 34000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. (Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less $20,000).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FATHER MARK unhurried in the beginning, moved up on the inside around the turn, angled out, drove clear and finished well. GRAY DANE lacked early speed, made a steady gain, finished four wide and was a clear second. HEZA SEXY ZONG vied for the early lead, forwardly placed throughout and proved no match for the top two. JERSEY BE GOOD pressed the early pace, weakened and was no threat late. SKIPPA broke a step slow, rushed , took command and faded. FRIEND'S DO CARE steadied early, racing in the back and was never a threat. FLASH OF RAIN raced in the middle of the pack in the beginning, dropped back and was outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Skippa
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke step slow, rushed up, took lead, faded

ENTRY.NAME: Heza Sexy Zong
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for early lead, forward throughout, no match for top two

ENTRY.NAME: Flash of Rain
ENTRY.COMMENT: in middle of pack, dropped back, outrun

ENTRY.NAME: Jersey Be Good
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, weakened, no threat late

ENTRY.NAME: Friend's Do Care
ENTRY.COMMENT: steadied early, in back, never a threat

ENTRY.NAME: Father Mark
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried, in back, inside turn, angled out, clear, finished well

ENTRY.NAME: Gray Dane
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked early speed, steady gain, 4wide, clear second

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 4 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 81. Claiming Purse 19000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS OR FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $20,000, For Each $2,500 To $15,000 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LUNAR MODULE pressed the pace, racing behind NACHO BIZ in the early part, took command down the home stretch and was kept to the task. FATHER RED unhurried in the beginning, saved ground around the turn, made a late inside bid, finished willingly and was a clear second. CHICKEN TRUCK lacked early speed, came around the turn wide, made an outside gain and got up for show. HARD CANDY raced near the middle of the field, within striking distance, lacked a rally and was caught for show. GOTMY MO JO WORKIN raced evenly near the back and was never a factor. CAT FIVE void of early speed and showed little. D T'S DREAM pressed the early pace and dropped back. NACHO BIZ showed brief speed, saved ground and retreated to the rear.

ENTRY.NAME: Cat Five
ENTRY.COMMENT: void of early speed, showed little

ENTRY.NAME: Nacho Biz
ENTRY.COMMENT: went to front, saved ground, retreated

ENTRY.NAME: Lunar Module
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, forward throughout, clear, kept to task

ENTRY.NAME: D T's Dream
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, dropped back

ENTRY.NAME: Father Red
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried, inside turn, late bid, willingly, clear second

ENTRY.NAME: Chicken Truck
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked early speed, wide turn, outside gain, up for show

ENTRY.NAME: Hard Candy
ENTRY.COMMENT: near middle of field, within striking distance, even effort

ENTRY.NAME: Gotmy Mo Jo Workin
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly near back, never a factor

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 5 1M Dirt CR: 98. Claiming Purse 19500. FOR FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE OCTOBER 8, 2022. Weight, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since March 8, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $20,000, For Each $2,500 To $15,000 2 lbs. (Claiming Races For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MUNQAD challenged for the lead, forward throughout, drove clear and won under confident handling. RUMOHR REIGNS raced within contention, saved ground around the second turn, angled out entering the stretch, made a bid, but proved second best. PAYNT BATTLE vied for the early advantage, weakened, proved no match late for the top two, but held on for third. DOC IRWIN lacked early speed, saved ground late and was outfinished for show. SNIVELING void of early speed and was never close. SILENT TAP pressed the early pace, dropped back and was no threat late.

ENTRY.NAME: Rumohr Reigns
ENTRY.COMMENT: within contention, inside 2nd tn, angled out, bid, clear second

ENTRY.NAME: Sniveling
ENTRY.COMMENT: void of early speed, never close

ENTRY.NAME: Silent Tap
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, dropped back, no threat late

ENTRY.NAME: Munqad
ENTRY.COMMENT: challenged for lead, drove clear, confident handling

ENTRY.NAME: Doc Irwin
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked early speed, saved ground late, outfinished for show

ENTRY.NAME: Paynt Battle
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for early lead, weakened, no match for top two

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Lafayette S. EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 89. Stakes Purse 60000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS. No fees to nominate or start. $600 to enter. Supplemental nominations of $1,200.00 will be accepted a time of entry. $60,000 guaranteed to be divided per condition book stakes structure payout percentages per field size. Weight 122 l bs. Non winners of a stake other than state bred or restricted 3 lbs. Non winners of a race other than maiden, claiming or starter 5 lbs. A race other than claiming 7 lbs. Preference to horses with highest total earnings at time of entry. Different ands ame owner entries will have equal draw according to preference. Failure to draw into race cancels all fees. Trophy to winning owner.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GHOST HERO broke a step slow, moved up quickly, took command, drove clear and was kept to the task. ALTO ROAD unhurried in the beginning, came around the turn three wide, made a late bid, proved no match for the winner, but was a clear second. NOT ON HERB showed early speed, forwardly placed throughout and proved no match for the top two. DOUBLE EDGE SWORD raced within striking distance, made a wide bid and was outfinished for show. BUTLER CABIN void of early speed, improved position, but was no factor. MACHINE GUN MAN flashed early speed, saved ground and faded. F J'S FLACO always raced near the back and showed little. COPTER showed early speed and dropped back.

ENTRY.NAME: Machine Gun Man
ENTRY.COMMENT: flashed early speed, saved ground, faded

ENTRY.NAME: F J's Flaco
ENTRY.COMMENT: always near back, showed little

ENTRY.NAME: Double Edge Sword
ENTRY.COMMENT: within striking distance, wide bid, outfinished for show

ENTRY.NAME: Butler Cabin
ENTRY.COMMENT: void of early speed, improved position, no factor

ENTRY.NAME: Ghost Hero
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke step slow, moved up quickly, clear, kept to task

ENTRY.NAME: Not On Herb
ENTRY.COMMENT: showed early speed, forward throughout, no match for top two

ENTRY.NAME: Alto Road
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried, 3wide turn, late bid, clear second, best of others

ENTRY.NAME: Copter
ENTRY.COMMENT: showed early speed, dropped back

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 7 1M Dirt CR: 73. Allowance Purse 35000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED FILLIES AND MARES FOUR YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Weight, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since March 8, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. Such A Race Since February 8, 2023 Allowed 5 lbs. (Claiming Races Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: OUR LITTLE GIRL lacked early speed, moved up on the outside around the final turn, made a wide bid and got up in time. DANCE LIL DARLING pressed the pace, racing outside around the first turn, took the advantage, drove clear down the home stretch and was caught late for the win. GIRLS COUNT broke thru the gates before the start, raced within striking distance, made a bid, proved no match for the top two, but got up for show. ANGELA'S CELERITY raced near the rear in the early going, made a steady gain and was caught for show. CHARGED TEMP raced within contention, weakened and was no threat late. ANN'S STORM raced near the back, saved ground around the final turn and was never a factor. TRINITY HOPE always raced near the back and showed little. CLASSICAL MAGNOLIA raced within contention and dropped back. MY SWEET SOPHIA went to the front, drove clear, saved ground and retreated.

ENTRY.NAME: Girls Count
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke thru gates, within striking, no match for top two, up for 3

ENTRY.NAME: Angela's Celerity
ENTRY.COMMENT: near rear early, steady gain, caught for show

ENTRY.NAME: My Sweet Sophia
ENTRY.COMMENT: went to front, drove clear, saved ground, retreated

ENTRY.NAME: Ann's Storm
ENTRY.COMMENT: near back, inside final turn, never a factor

ENTRY.NAME: Trinity Hope
ENTRY.COMMENT: always near back, showed little

ENTRY.NAME: Classical Magnolia
ENTRY.COMMENT: within contention, dropped back

ENTRY.NAME: Charged Temp
ENTRY.COMMENT: within contention, weakened, no threat late

ENTRY.NAME: Dance Lil Darling
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, outside 1st turn, lead, clear, caught

ENTRY.NAME: Our Little Girl
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked early speed, outside 2nd turn, wide bid, up in time

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Evangeline Mile S. EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 8 1M Dirt CR: 106. Stakes Purse 100000. FOR FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Free to nominate, $500 to enter with $500 to start. Supplemental nominations of $2000 will be accepted at time of entry which shall include all fees. $100,000 Guaranteed to be divided per condition book stake structure pay out percentages per field size. Weights: 125 lbs. Non winners $60,000 at one mile or over in 2023, allowed 3 lbs., of $45,000 other than maiden, claiming or starter at one mile over since November 8, 2022, 5 lbs., of $22,500 other than maiden, claimingo r starter at one mile or over since December 8, 7 lbs., a race other than maiden, claiming or starter at one mile or over in 2023, 10 lbs. Preference to horses with the highest total earnings in 2022-2023 at time of entry. Different owners and same oo wner entries will receive equal draw according to preference. Failure to draw into race cancels all fees. Trophy to winning owner.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FIVE STAR GENERAL went to the front, drove clear, saved ground and was kept to the task. HYPERBOLIST pressed the pace, followed the winner and was a clear second. STRONG EAGLE raced within striking distance, forwardly placed throughout and proved third best. MOTATAABEQ void of early speed, moved up on the outside around the final turn, made a mild bid, racing wide, but was no real factor. RIGHTANDJUST raced within contention, faded and was no threat late. FORTUITY raced evenly near the back, came around the first turn on the outside and was outrun. DUST EM void of early speed and was never close.

ENTRY.NAME: Hyperbolist
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, followed winner, clear second

ENTRY.NAME: Rightandjust
ENTRY.COMMENT: within contention, faded, no threat late

ENTRY.NAME: Strong Eagle
ENTRY.COMMENT: within striking distance, forward throughout, third best

ENTRY.COMMENT: void of early speed, outside final turn, wide gain, up for 4th

ENTRY.NAME: Dust Em
ENTRY.COMMENT: void of early speed, never close

ENTRY.NAME: Five Star General
ENTRY.COMMENT: went to front, drove clear, saved ground, kept to task

ENTRY.NAME: Fortuity
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly near back, outside first turn, outrun

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 9 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 67. Claiming Purse 13000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.

CLAIM.OWNER: BMS Racing Stable (Sarah Delany) and Hanna James E

RACE.FOOTNOTES: MIZSPELT pressed the pace, moved up around the turn, took the advantage, drove clear before the wire and finished well. CARLOS PUNCH vied for the early lead, saved ground around the turn, couldn't match strides with the winner late, but held on for second. SWIFT N TRAFFIC raced within striking distance, made a late bid and missed second. CORN SOUP raced in the middle of the field, moved up down the home stretch and was outfinished for show. IDE LIKE HAWAII raced evenly near the back in the early part, made a mild bid, racing wide, but was no factor. EASY CHANCE raced within contention, weakened and was no threat late. SABERMAN lacked early speed, raced outside around the final turn and was no threat late. CARLOS'S MAMA raced evenly near the back and showed little. MR. E EDWARDS always raced near the back and showed little. COTTONCLUB SOLDIER dueled on the front end and dropped back.
